item.title: Holding cash heading into 2025? Retirees should consider this ‘guaranteed’ investment strategy in the new year.
item.description: Now could be a good time to invest in TIPS.

item.title: Trump Picks Paul Atkins to Run SEC
item.description: The former SEC commissioner is expected to ease oversight, including on cryptocurrency firms.

item.title: Terns’s stock soars as analysts cheer leukemia data — and predict more gains
item.description: The pharma company now has two positive proof-of-concept trials under its belt, including its weight-loss pill.

item.title: Dollar Falls After Services PMI Data
item.description: The dollar weakened after the ISM services PMI November print declined more than economists expected.

item.title: UnitedHealth executive Brian Thompson shot and killed in ‘targeted attack’ — here’s what we know
item.description: Authorities say the veteran health-insurance executive was shot Wednesday morning by an unknown assailant outside the company’s investor conference.
